com.github.sdorra.database

Annotation Type JPA


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={METHOD,TYPE})
public @interface JPA
    The jpa annotation can be used to mark tests for which the in-memory database should be started. The annnotation can be used on the class or on the method level, to apply the jpa settings for all tests of a class or only for one specific test.
    Author:
    Sebastian Sdorra

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String value
      Persistence unit name.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean autoTransaction
      Set to true to start a transaction before the test begins and commit it after the tests ends.
      String encoding
      Encoding of the sql file.
      String sql
      Path to a sql file in the classpath.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract String value
        Persistence unit name.
        Returns:
        persistence unit name

      • sql

        public abstract String sql
        Path to a sql file in the classpath. This sql file is loaded on database start.
        Returns:
        path to sql file
        Default:
        ""

      • encoding

        public abstract String encoding
        Encoding of the sql file.
        Returns:
        encoding of sql file
        Default:
        "UTF-8"

      • autoTransaction

        public abstract boolean autoTransaction
        Set to true to start a transaction before the test begins and commit it after the tests ends.
        Returns:
        true if auto transactions are enabled
        Default:
        false
